title: Chile’s President Says Government Has Canceled APEC Summit
text:
Chile’s president, Sebastián Piñera, said Wednesday that his government canceled plans to host an Asia-Pacific trade summit and a United Nations conference on climate change as the country grapples with massive protests.

Mr. Piñera said the government canceled a November summit of nations from the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation in the Chilean capital of Santiago to focus on restoring order and security after protests against inequality descended into violence. The U.N.’s climate-change conference, known as COP 25, was planned...
description: Chile’s president, Sebastián Piñera, said his government canceled plans to host an Asia-Pacific trade summit in November, clouding prospects for the speedy conclusion of a “phase one” trade deal between the U.S. and China.
